sections.title: Detecting Color and Light in FTC
sections.content: Color sensors detect the color and intensity of light, allowing robots to identify game elements, lines, or field markings.

sections.title: Color Sensor Facts
sections.subtitle: How they work
items: Measure red, green, blue, and alpha (light intensity)
Can distinguish between different colored objects
Useful for line following and scoring tasks

sections.title: Color Sensor Example
Calibration
sections.content: Test color sensors under competition lighting and calibrate thresholds for reliable detection.
